page.title: 04INFORMATION SYSTEMS
page.content:
B.T.Networks
The latest word processors are used and typing drafts can be sent from London in manuscripts and returned in typewritten form by special data links the same day. {British Telecom}have bought some land at the rear of Whittington House, extending the site to{4 acres}and are looking at the possibility of building a computer centre there. This has not been confirmed yet but a decision is expected in the next{3 months.} If the centre does come to Oswestry it may mean more jobs for local people _ especially those with computer skills.
